title: Pbe Email
body: Hello Summoners, I have received an email. saying get to test but once i click on create your pbe account . it takes me to the pbe page and it says thanks for you application and i cant go past that :( please help

replies.body: Was this for the PBE or the Alpha Client? The emails can look fairly similar, but if it does happen to be the PBE email (with Jayce on it) then you'll want to ensure you're logging in with the right account. If you have more than one account, one of your alts could have been accepted into the PBE.
